channel.title: Construction on server? [317] or [508]
channel.description: How do you get construction on your server, my friends server has working construction but he refuses to tell me how he gets it, PS, i run my server with silabsoft/moparscape, not on a client :D

item.title: Construction on server? [317] or [508]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“ModAssassin, post:7, topic:280052”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=369623.msg2799493#msg2799493 date=1243282621]

well i can GIVE you a source that has is a 317 with construction. i don’t take any credit for this it is the owners client. here is where u can all the info/download the source:
** [owner won’t let me post]

but as far as 508 goes, just download berkyscape 508 client…it has lal 24 skills working INCLUDING construction…hope this helped a little ;\

Again, as with your other post, this thread is two days old. I’m sure the owner of this thread would have replied if he was in need of more assistance. Just remember to read the date before posting next time.
[/quote]

it’s only 2 days old…[/quote]
As I’ve stated above, the creator of this thread did not respond; therefore, you should not bump it.

Read full topic

item.title: Construction on server? [317] or [508]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

@topic Do as whoever said, and write it yourself. Just start basics, with using items and requiring items to make global objects. Then work on the tab, then work on the house etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Construction on server? [317] or [508]
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

  1. mopar/silab clients for construction - no.

1st you will need to change the skills tab so you can’t use them.

2)“how do i “Program” it then?” if you have to ask this, go learn some stuff. Programing a whole skill isn’t as easy as adding npc’s, making commands. I myself cannot do this, so i won’t be able to help. Construction is a complex skill, that’s why it’s rare in servers.

Read full topic
